Interface TreeComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
DTEdge, DTNode, Edge, Node, QueryEdge, QueryNode, QueryValueNode, SGAbstractNode, SGAddressNode, SGBooleanNode, SGDateNode, SGDoubleNode, SGEdge, SGIntNode, SGNode, SGStringNode, UndeterminedDTNode
public interface TreeComponent

TreeComponent is an interface for components of trees (nodes and edges).

Version:
1.1 20-10-2006
Author:
Feikje Hielkema
